00023 #ifndef _CLUSTERS_H
00024 #define _CLUSTERS_H

00030 /******************************************************************************
00031                    Define(s) section
00032 ******************************************************************************/
00041 #define DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE(name, props, aid, atype) \
00042   .name = {.id = aid, .type = atype, .properties = props}
00043 
00052 #define DEFINE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(name, props, aid, atype, minValue, maxValue) \
00053   .name = {.id = aid, .type = atype, .properties = ZCL_BOUNDARY_CHECK | props, .minVal = minValue, .maxVal = maxValue}
00054 
00062 #define DEFINE_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE(name, props, aid, atype, minReport, maxReport) \
00063   .name = {.id = aid, .type = atype, .properties = ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE | (props), .minReportInterval = minReport, .maxReportInterval = maxReport}
00064 
00072 #define DEFINE_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE_WITH_BOUNDARY(name, props, aid, atype, minReport, maxReport, minValue, maxValue) \
00073   .name = {.id = aid, .type = atype, .properties = ZCL_BOUNDARY_CHECK | ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE | (props), .minReportInterval = minReport, .maxReportInterval = maxReport, .minVal = minValue, .maxVal = maxValue}
00074 
00082 #define COMMAND_OPTIONS(cldirection, clwaitingResponse, clackRequest) \
00083   {.direction = ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_##cldirection, .waitingResponse = clwaitingResponse, \
00084    .ackRequest = clackRequest}
00085 
00091 #define DEFINE_COMMAND(cname, cid, coptions, cind) \
00092   .cname = {.id = cid, .options = coptions, cind}
00093 
00097 #define DEFINE_ARRAY(name, props, aid, etype, count)  \
00098   .name = {.id = aid, .type = ZCL_ARRAY_DATA_TYPE_ID, .properties = props & ~(ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE), .value = {.type = etype, .cnt = count}}
00099 
00103 #define DEFINE_SET(name, props, aid, etype, count)  \
00104   .name = {.id = aid, .type = ZCL_SET_DATA_TYPE_ID, .properties = props & ~(ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE), .value = {.type = etype, .cnt = count}}
00105 
00109 #define DEFINE_BAG(name, props, aid, etype, count)  \
00110   .name = {.id = aid, .type = ZCL_BAG_DATA_TYPE_ID, .properties = props & ~(ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE), .value = {.type = etype, .cnt = count}}
00111 
00115 #define DEFINE_STRUCTURE(name, props, aid, count)  \
00116   .name = {.id = aid, .type = ZCL_STRUCTURE_DATA_TYPE_ID, .properties = props & ~(ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE), .value = {.cnt = count}}
00117 
00118 /* ZCL command ack request field */
00119 #define ZCL_COMMAND_NO_ACK 0 //!< APS acknowledgement is not requested
00120 #define ZCL_COMMAND_ACK    1 //!< APS acknowledgement is requested
00121 
00122 #define ZCL_SERVER_CLUSTER_TYPE  0 //!< Server part of a cluster
00123 #define ZCL_CLIENT_CLUSTER_TYPE  1 //!< Client part of a cluster
00124 
00125 /* ZCL Header Direction sub-field value */
00126 #define ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_CLIENT_TO_SERVER    0x00 //!< A command will be sent from client side to server side
00127 #define ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_SERVER_TO_CLIENT    0x01 //!< A command will be sent from server side to client side
00128 
00129 /* ZCL cluster side possible values */
00130 #define ZCL_CLUSTER_SIDE_SERVER ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_CLIENT_TO_SERVER //!< To define a cluster of a server side
00131 #define ZCL_CLUSTER_SIDE_CLIENT ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DIRECTION_SERVER_TO_CLIENT //!< To define a cluster of a client side
00132 
00134 #define ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_DISABLE_DEFAULT_RESPONSE      0x01
00135 
00136 #define ZCL_FRAME_CONTROL_ENABLE_DEFAULT_RESPONSE       0x00
00137 
00139 #define ZCL_THERE_IS_RELEVANT_RESPONSE                  0x01
00140 
00141 #define ZCL_THERE_IS_NO_RELEVANT_RESPONSE               0x00
00142 
00143 #define ZCL_RESPONSE_CONTROLLED_BY_PAYLOAD              0x02
00144 
00146 #define ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY                0
00147 
00148 #define ZCL_APPLICATION_LINK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY       1
00149 
00150 
00151 /* Bits for declaring properties bitmask of attribute */
00152 #define ZCL_READWRITE_ATTRIBUTE  0U //!< Attribute can be read and written remotely
00153 #define ZCL_REPORTABLE_ATTRIBUTE 1U //!< Attribute can be reported
00154 #define ZCL_READONLY_ATTRIBUTE   2U //!< Attribute can not be written by remote nodes
00155 #define ZCL_REPORTING_CONFIGURED 4U //!< Attribute is configured for reporting
00156 #define ZCL_ON_CHANGE_REPORT     8U //!< Attribute should be reported using minimum reporting time
00157 #define ZCL_BOUNDARY_CHECK      16U //!< Attribute whose value needs to be checked for boundary check
00158 #define ZCL_CHECK_OTHER_ATTR    32U //!< Attrbute vlue boundary check with other attribute value
00159 
00160 #define  ZCL_DEFAULT_CLUSTER_SECURITY    ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_CLUSTER_SECURITY
00161 
00162 /*************************************************************************/
00165 enum
00166 {
00167   /* General clusters defined by ZCL Specification */
00168   BASIC_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0000),                            
00169   POWER_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0001),              
00170   IDENTIFY_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0003),                         
00171   GROUPS_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0004),                           
00172   SCENES_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0005),                           
00173   ONOFF_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0006),                            
00174   ONOFF_SWITCH_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0007),       
00175   LEVEL_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0008),                    
00176   ALARMS_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0009),                            
00177   TIME_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x000a),                             
00178   OTAU_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0019),                             
00179   GREEN_POWER_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0021),                      
00180   THERMOSTAT_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0201),                       
00181   FAN_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0202),                       
00182   THERMOSTAT_UI_CONF_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0204),               
00183   /* Lighting */
00184   COLOR_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0300),                    
00185   ILLUMINANCE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0400),          
00186   TEMPERATURE_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0402),          
00187   HUMIDITY_MEASUREMENT_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0405),             
00188   OCCUPANCY_SENSING_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0406),                
00189   /* Security & Safety */
00190   IAS_ZONE_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0500),                         
00191   IAS_ACE_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0501),                          
00192   GENERIC_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0600),                   
00193   BACNET_PROTOCOL_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0601),           
00194   /* Smart Energy Profile specific clusters */
00195   PRICE_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0700),                            
00196   DEMAND_RESPONSE_AND_LOAD_CONTROL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0701), 
00197   SIMPLE_METERING_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0702),                  
00198   MESSAGE_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0703),                          
00199   ZCL_SE_TUNNEL_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0704),                    
00200   ZCL_KEY_ESTABLISHMENT_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0800),            
00201   DIAGNOSTICS_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0b05),                      
00202   /* Light Link Profile clusters */
00203   ZLL_COMMISSIONING_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x1000),                
00204   /* Manufacturer specific clusters */
00205   LINK_INFO_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0xFF00),                        
00206   /*Light & Occupancy Device based application clusters */
00207   BALLAST_CONFIGURATION_CLUSTER_ID = CCPU_TO_LE16(0x0301),      
00208   /* manudacturer specifc cluster starting id */
00209   MANUFAC_SPECIFIC_CLUSTER_ID_START = CCPU_TO_LE16(0xFC00),
00210   /* manudacturer specifc cluster end id */
00211   MANUFAC_SPECIFIC_CLUSTER_ID_END = CCPU_TO_LE16(0xFFFF)
00212 };

00217 /*************************************************************************/
00220 typedef struct
00221 {
00222   uint8_t   direction          :1; 
00223   uint8_t   defaultResponse    :1; 
00224   uint8_t   waitingResponse    :2; 
00225   uint8_t   ackRequest         :1; 
00226   uint8_t   reserved           :3; 
00227 } ZclCommandOptions_t;
00228 
00229 /*************************************************************************/
00232 typedef struct
00233 {
00234   ZCL_CommandId_t id;
00235   ZclCommandOptions_t options;
00236   ZCL_Status_t (*callback)(ZCL_Addressing_t *addressing, uint8_t payloadLength, uint8_t *payload);
00237 } ZclCommand_t;
00238 
00239 BEGIN_PACK
00240 /*************************************************************************//*
00241 Layouts for supporting ZCL structured types
00242 *****************************************************************************/
00243 typedef struct PACK
00244 {
00245   uint8_t type;                       
00246   uint8_t value[1];                   
00247 } ZclStructureElement_t;
00248 
00249 typedef struct PACK
00250 {
00251   uint16_t cnt;                       
00252   ZclStructureElement_t elements[1];  
00253 } ZclStructure_t;
00254 
00255 typedef struct PACK
00256 {
00257   uint8_t type;                       
00258   uint16_t cnt;                       
00259   uint8_t elements[1];                
00260 } ZclArraySetBag_t;
00261 
00262 /*************************************************************************/
00265 typedef struct PACK
00266 {
00267   ZCL_ReportTime_t reportCounter; 
00268   ZCL_ReportTime_t minReportInterval; 
00269   ZCL_ReportTime_t maxReportInterval; 
00270 } ZclReportableAttributeTail_t;
00271 END_PACK
